content: snow bound ear warmer / headband crochet pattern please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites ***free crochet pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2025/12/snow-bound-ear-warmer-headband-crochet html ***video link *** https //youtu be/2ieoy3fmch4 si=xduqrmsofanb2v1y skill easy materials crochet hook k/ 6 5 mm yarn med 4 i love this yarn metallic c1 - ivory 3 oz c2 c3 c4 3 different colors of choice - 5 oz of each yarn needle stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet front loop only flo back loop only blo size fits 22- 24 inch head notes ear warner is stitched holding 2 strands of yarn together ch1 does not count as a st phot0 /video demo is done in a solid no sparkle
